mapper.insert: INSERT INTO surveyitem(sur_itemno, surveyno, itemseq, item, itemfile, itemcnt) VALUES(surveyitem_seq.nextval, #{surveyno}, #{itemseq}, #{item}, #{itemfile}, #{itemcnt})
mapper.select: SELECT sur_itemno, surveyno, itemseq, item, itemfile, itemcnt FROM surveyitem ORDER BY itemseq ASC

SELECT sur_itemno, surveyno, itemseq, item, itemfile, itemcnt, word FROM surveyitem
WHERE surveyno=#{surveyno}
WHERE surveyno=#{surveyno} AND (item LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR itemfile LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR word LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%')
ORDER BY surveyno DESC
